name: Starless Sky
description:
Made for GMTK Jam 2

A space combat game set in the complete blackness of space, the player must manage their visibility while attempting to destroy enemy targets which are similarly invisible.

Starless Sky primarily revolves around heat management; all actions generate heat, and enemies use heat to detect you. Plan your moves carefully, watch your heat, and take out all the enemy turrets!

Credits: Design and Development

Sean Mansell (@arknano)

http://arknano.net

Programming

Jason Beetham

http://jasonabeetham.wixsite.com/jasonbeetham

Models

Lite Black (@JB_LiteBlack)

https://sketchfab.com/lite

Skybox generated using @wwwtyro's Space Skybox Generator.
